snippet: KAHN--Walter. Born August 27, 1917 in Cologne, Germany, passed away January 18th at home in Forest Hills, surrounded by family. Loving father to Sandy and Nathan, Robin and Simon, Vivian and Gerry; grandfather and great-grandfather, husband of 63 years to his dedicated and beloved wife Grace. Funeral services were held on Tuesday, January 19th at the Queens Jewish Center, of which the Kahn family were founders and leaders, followed by burial in Israel. May the memory of the righteous be a blessing. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KAHN--Walter. Born August 27, 1917 in Cologne, Germany, passed away January 18th at home in Forest Hills, surrounded by family. Loving father to Sandy and Nathan, Robin and Simon, Vivian and Gerry; grandfather and great-grandfather, husband of 63 years to his dedicated and beloved wife Grace. Funeral services were held on Tuesday, January 19th at the Queens Jewish Center, of which the Kahn family were founders and leaders, followed by burial in Israel. May the memory of the righteous be a blessing. 1/3
